main.com.cryptogram.solver

Class Punctuation

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.com.cryptogram.solver.Punctuation

  • final class Punctuation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages punctuation, which is separated into two categories. Good punctuation: Punctuation that is used in words, like ' for contractions Bad punctuation: Punctuation that is not actually part of the word, like " or , or ? The methods check to see if something is good or bad punctuation. Bad punctuation will be removed, but good punctuation will not.
    Author:
    Corbin Young
